title: Split up TriggerIntegrationTest into multiple tests to isolate and increase reliability
description: TriggerIntegrationTest is big enough already. It is time to split it up into multiple test classes. This will keep one test method from affecting the others and help tone down the logs in case we need to troubleshoot further.
